segments.text: That boy is going to fall any second now, and I can’t look away.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is wobbling like it’s about to give up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s stretching so far, and he’s got that plate in one hand like he’s trying to be sneaky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for her share like it’s no big deal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They’re both so focused on those cookies, they don’t even see the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I want to yell at them to stop, but I don’t want to be the bad guy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is right there, and she’s completely missing it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water’s getting closer to the stool, and that’s just asking for trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how calm the outside looks compared to this mess inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone’s going to get hurt, and it’s going to be a disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR
